name: Vampire Pyre
text: If this card is Special Summoned: You can pay 500LP; Special Summon 1 "Vampire" monster from your Deck, and if you do, its effects are negated. You can send 1 "Vampire" card from your hand or face-up on the field to the GY; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Vampire Pyre" once per turn.
